content: अनिष्ट {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unwished, undesirable; unfavourable, disagreeable, ill (with <ab>gen.</ab>); ध्यायत्यनिष्टं यत्किंचित्पाणिग्राहस्य चेतसा <ls>Ms. 9. 21</ls> whatever ill she thinks of her husband. {@--2@} Evil, forbidden. {@--3@} Bad, unlucky, ominous. {@--4@} Not honoured with a sacrifice. --ष्टं An evil, mishap, misfortune, calamity, disadvantage, a crime, offence, wrong, unwelcome thing; °एकबुद्धि <ls>Māl. 8. 12</ls>; भवत्यनिष्टादपि नाम दुःसहान्मनस्विनीनां प्रतिपत्तिरीदृशी <ls>Ku. 5. 42</ls>; ill-omen; प्रातरेव °दर्शनं जातं <ls>H. 1.</ls>
